items.sentence: How do you decorate your house for Christmas?
How long ago was it that you lived in Boston?
I don\'t think it\'ll be easy for me do that.
I don\'t think it\'s anything to worry about.
Why do you say such horrible things about me?
Someone must\'ve told Tom, but it wasn\'t me.
Tom was surprised by Mary\'s choice of words.
Tom wasn\'t an easy person to get along with.
Tom would tell me if he wasn\'t happy, right?
It\'s crowded, so let\'s take the next train.
That\'s probably the last thing Tom would do.
The police seem to know exactly where we are.
The police think that Tom beat Mary to death.
The room had only a bed, a table and a chair.
The station is a three-minute walk from here.
I have several friends who speak French well.
I have some interesting questions to ask Tom.
It makes no difference whether you go or not.
It was after dark when we got to the village.
I hate to run the risk, but I have no choice.
I have a feeling you might want to see these.
Tom moved back to Boston to be with his kids.
Tom is the one who told me your phone number.
Tom is the one who was taken to the hospital.
Tom is the only friend I have here in Boston.
Bus fares vary according to how far you ride.
Tom and Mary are lucky that John isn\'t here.
Please tell me the secret to making good jam.
Have you arranged for the room to be cleaned?
Tom didn\'t want to tell Mary his life story.
Tom didn\'t want to tell Mary how old he was.
Tom didn\'t yet know what he was going to do.
Tom certainly seems to have a sense of humor.
Tom is optimistic about this year\'s harvest.
Tom tried to persuade Mary to stay in Boston.
Many non-Christians celebrate Christmas, too.
Many people around the world love spicy food.
Mary and her sister have a similar hairstyle.
Tom told me that I should go there by myself.
Tom told me where he hid the stolen diamonds.
Tom took the concert ticket Mary offered him.
I play trumpet in a symphonic wind orchestra.
I played the flute when I was in high school.
I really have to think about this a bit more.
I really don\'t think that you\'d understand.
I don\'t drink tequila as often as I used to.
I don\'t have any more time to talk with you.
I don\'t have as much free time as I used to.
I don\'t have enough time to eat lunch today.
I\'m going to leave about ten in the morning.
